title: Introduction to Biochemical Engineering
description: Introduction to biochemical engineering. Topics include biological macromolecules, enzyme kinetics, cell metabolism, protein synthesis, recombinant DNA technology, bioreactor design, and bioproduct recovery. Prerequisites: department approval will ensure students have taken CENG 100 or an equivalent undergraduate-level material and energy balances course. Students may not receive credit for both CENG 160 and CENG 260.
